Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener
public class CLI
extends java.lang.Object
implements UI, java.lang.Runnable
Main CLI client class; it manages the game if the player decides to play with Command Line Interface.
Version:
2.0.0
Author:
Luca Pirovano, Nicol√≤ Sonnino

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main class of CLI client. It instantiates a new CLI class, running it.
      Parameters:
      args - the standard java main parameters.

    • clearScreen

      public static void clearScreen()
      Method clearScreen flushes terminal's screen

    • toggleActiveGame

      public void toggleActiveGame​(boolean activeGame)
      Method toggleActiveGame changes the value of the parameter activeGame, which states if the game is active or if it has finished.
      Parameters:
      activeGame - the value (type boolean) based on the status of the game.

    • setup

      public void setup()
      Method setup called when a client instance has started. It asks player's nickname and tries to establish a connection to the remote server through the socket interface. If the connection is active, displays a message on the CLI.

    • loop

      public void loop()
      Method loop keeps running and executing all actions client side, if the input has toggled (through the apposite method) it calls the action one and parses the player's input.

    • isActiveGame

      public boolean isActiveGame()
      Method isActiveGame returns the activeGame of this CLI object.
      Returns:
      the activeGame (type boolean) of this CLI object.

    • run

      public void run()
      Method run loops waiting for a message.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • firstBuildBoard

      private void firstBuildBoard​(DisplayCell[][] grid)
      Method firstBuildBoard creates empty board.
      Parameters:
      grid - the printed board (type DisplayCell[][]).

    • boardUpdater

      private void boardUpdater​(DisplayCell[][] grid)
      Method boardUpdater updates grid after a change occurred in ClientBoard.
      Parameters:
      grid - the printed board (type DisplayCell[][]).

    • generateTypeOfLevel

      private java.lang.String[] generateTypeOfLevel​(int i, int j, int level)
      Method generateTypeOfLevel generates right levels for CLI use.
      Parameters:
      i - counter of type int a counter.
      j - cof type int a counter.
      level - of type int the level to print.
      Returns:
      String[] grid's level row.

    • generateRows

      private java.lang.String[] generateRows​(int level, java.lang.String[] levels)
      Method generateRows splits levels array into multiple Strings.
      Parameters:
      level - of type int level.
      levels - of type String[] the possible levels printable.
      Returns:
      String[] rows generated.

    • addWorkerToCell

      private void addWorkerToCell​(java.lang.String color, java.lang.String[] rows, int level, int type)
      Method addWorkerToCell adds worker to Printable cell.
      Parameters:
      color - of type String Worker's color.
      rows - of type String[] the rows used to insert player.
      level - of type int the level modified.

    • getRightIndex

      private int getRightIndex​(boolean b, int i2, int i3)
      Method getRightIndex gets right index in order to print levels on the grid.
      Parameters:
      b - of type boolean defines the two cases in order split row in the correct spot.
      i2 - of type int first type of counter.
      i3 - of type int second type of counters.
      Returns:
      int correct counter.

    • createStringMap

      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String[]> createStringMap​(java.lang.String[] temp, java.lang.String[] player)
      Method createStringMap encapsulates player and temp arrays used for addWorkerToCell method for complaints reasons.
      Parameters:
      temp - of type String[] temporary cell's rows in which player is inserted.
      player - of type String[] needed to be inserted.
      Returns:
      HashMap the two strings.

    • insertPlayer

      private void insertPlayer​(java.lang.String color, java.lang.String[] rows, int[] cellInfos, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String[]> stringMap, int[][] indexes, java.lang.String backgroundColor, int[] counters)

    • printBoard

      private void printBoard​(DisplayCell[][] grid)
      Method printBoard prints board to the player.
      Parameters:
      grid - the printed board.

    • insertMenus

      private int insertMenus​(java.lang.String[] sideMenuRows, java.lang.String[] guideMenuRows, int check, int k)
      Method insertMenus inserts sideMenu and guideMenu next to the grid.
      Parameters:
      sideMenuRows - of type String[] the side menu's rows.
      guideMenuRows - of type String[] the guide menu's rows.
      check - of type int the counter needed for the correct printing.
      k - of type int the counter needed for the correct printing.
      Returns:
      int the checker used for switching menu's rows.

    • insertSideMenuRows

      private void insertSideMenuRows​(java.lang.String sideMenuRow)
      Method insertSideMenuRows inserts side menu rows into the output stream.
      Parameters:
      sideMenuRow - of type String the side status menu.

    • insertGuideMenuRows

      private void insertGuideMenuRows​(java.lang.String[] guideMenuRows, int i2)
      Method insertGuideMenuRows inserts guide rows into the output stream.
      Parameters:
      guideMenuRows - of type String[] the side guide's rows.
      i2 - of type int the counter required for correct printing.

    • buildSideMenu

      private java.lang.String[] buildSideMenu()
      Method buildSideMenu builds side status menu.
      Returns:
      String[] the side status menu.

    • buildSideHelp

      private java.lang.String[] buildSideHelp()
      Method buildSideHelp build side guide.
      Returns:
      String[] the side guide.

    • addSpaces

      private java.lang.StringBuilder addSpaces​(int max, java.lang.String s)
      Method addScores adds spaces to side menu.
      Parameters:
      max - of type int max length of side menu.
      Returns:
      StringBuilder the string added to side menu.

    • addBlocks

      private java.lang.StringBuilder addBlocks​(int max)
      Method addScores adds blocks to side menu.
      Parameters:
      max - of type int max length of side menu.
      Returns:
      StringBuilder the string added to side menu.

    • addScores

      private java.lang.StringBuilder addScores​(int max)
      Method addScores adds scores to side menu.
      Parameters:
      max - of type int max length of side menu.
      Returns:
      StringBuilder the string added to side menu.

    • choosePlayerNumber

      public void choosePlayerNumber()
      Method choosePlayerNumber lets the first-connected user to decides the match capacity. Terminates the client if the player inserts an incorrect type of input.

    • chooseColor

      public void chooseColor​(java.util.List<PlayerColors> available)
      Method chooseColor lets the player decide his color, relying on the available ones. If the player is the last in a three-players match, the server automatically assign him the last color.
      Parameters:
      available - of type List the list of available colors, which will be printed out.

    • greaterThan

      private void greaterThan()
      Method greaterThan prints ">".

    • errorHandling

      public void errorHandling​(GameError error)
      Method errorHandling handles an error received from the server, following a user action or saying him he cannot perform any action in that moment.
      Parameters:
      error - of type GameError the error received from the server.

    • printError

      private void printError​(java.io.PrintStream err, java.lang.String s)
      Method printError prints error message.
      Parameters:
      err - of type PrintStream the output stream.
      s - of type String the message.

    • initialPhaseHandling

      public void initialPhaseHandling​(java.lang.String value)
      Method initialPhaseHandling handles the messages received from the server during the initial phase like, for example, the request of the number of player.
      Parameters:
      value - of type String the answer received from the server.

    • godRequest

      private void godRequest​(ChallengerMessages req)
      Method godRequest handles selection of gods and turn's order.
      Parameters:
      req - of type ChallengerMessages the message containing infos about gods and players.

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange​(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Method propertyChange waits for a server response which is previously processed by the ActionHandler.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - of type PropertyChangeEvent event containing information about the response type and its new value.

    • fireSelectSpaces

      private void fireSelectSpaces​(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Method fireSelectSpaces inserts checkers into printSpaces method.
      Parameters:
      evt - of type PropertyChangeEvent event containing instructions for printSpaces method.

    • fireBoardUpdate

      private void fireBoardUpdate​(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Method fireBoardUpdate inserts checkers into updateCli method.
      Parameters:
      evt - of type PropertyChangeEvent event containing instructions for updateCli method.

    • otherPlayerLost

      private void otherPlayerLost​(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Method otherPlayerLost updates CLI, removes loser from CLI and prints its nickname.
      Parameters:
      evt - of type PropertyChangeEvent the event containing loser's nickname.

    • end

      private void end​(java.lang.String message)
      Method end prints end message.
      Parameters:
      message - of type String the message printed when turn ends.

    • selectWorker

      public void selectWorker()
      Method selectWorker prints SELECT_WORKER option.

    • printMenu

      public void printMenu​(boolean move, boolean build, boolean end, java.lang.String message) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Method printMenu prints menu under the grid.
      Parameters:
      move - of type boolean the check used to enable move entry in menu.
      build - of type boolean the check used to enable build entry in menu.
      end - of type boolean the check used to enable end entry in menu.
      message - of type String the content of message received.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when TimeUnit fails.

    • firstPrintMenu

      public void firstPrintMenu() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Method firstPrintMenu prints menu without any entries.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when TimeUnit fails.

    • firstUpdateCli

      public void firstUpdateCli()
      Method firstUpdateCli prints and updates for the first CLI.

    • updateCli

      public void updateCli​(boolean move, boolean build, boolean end, java.lang.String message)
      Method updateCli prints and updates CLI.
      Parameters:
      move - of type boolean the check used to enable move entry in menu.
      build - of type boolean the check used to enable build entry in menu.
      end - of type boolean the check used to enable end entry in menu.
      message - of type String the content of message received.

    • printSpaces

      public void printSpaces​(boolean move, boolean build, boolean end, java.lang.String message)
      Method printSpaces prints possible actions after a SelectBuild/SelectMove.
      Parameters:
      move - of type boolean the check used to enable move entry in menu.
      build - of type boolean the check used to enable build entry in menu.
      end - of type boolean the check used to enable end entry in menu.
      message - of type String the spaces extracted from SelectSpaceMessage.
